name: Cheese Man
description:
As Cheese Man, you need to collect and eat cheese. If you eat too much, you will start to become slow. Go to the toilet to regain your speed!

The timer counts down. When the timer is at 0, the game ends. When you collect cheese, the timer increases.

This is my first itch.io game. It's very simple. I just wanted to get a feel for how it is to publish a game on itch.io.
